basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello! I am a passionate FrontEnd developer specializing in React, MongoDB, Express and Node(MERN Stack). I also have knowledge in PHP, Laravel, MySQL and REST/RESTful APIs. My passion for learning and technology have led me to discover the beautiful world of development. Now I find myself navigating this immense world of IT, facing new challenges every day in order to improve my skills as a developer and grow as a professional, giving 100% of myself to offer better solutions to any problem. I believe that teamwork and communication are key to carrying out any project successfully. If you like my work and want me to develop your project or be part of your company or work team, do not hesitate to contact me.

projects.title: React Budget app
projects.description: I created this budget app for personal finances using react hooks and LocalStorage where you can add different budget categories and expenses, with animated color bars to measure and balance your expenses.

projects.title: React Weather app
projects.description: This React weather app was built using the OpenWeatherMap API. I used axios to connect with our API, and successfully consume it in a very simple but fancy UI.

projects.title: Expense tracker FullStack
projects.description: This react expense tracking app was built using Hooks and Context API, a back-end API with Express and MongoDB. It allows you to keep a permanent control of your expenses and income, in a simple but dynamic interface.
